We enroll 500 HSV-2 seropositive single person ( 250 per arm ) , stratify gender history symptomatic genital herpes , prospectively follow 1 year assess sexual behavior , adherence therapy , herpes-related quality life . These outcome measure self-report confidential , computer-based assessment . We plan use data trial model effect increase proportion sexually-active HSV-2 infected person take suppressive therapy population-level incidence prevalence HSV-2 .
